content: + **free** video tutorial 1 it s my first ever tutorial thoughts and feedback more than welcome <3 the **cozy companion sweater** is an easy versatile pattern that utilizes your pet s measurements for a snug tailored fit that keeps them cozy and secure **lightweight and easy to put on and off** it s perfect for the windy autumnal days when your pet needs an extra layer of warmth **difficulty level ** easy **terminology ** american crochet terminology **materials needed ** **yarn ** alize burcum batik or any other weight 4 yarn i recommend using soft acrylic the yardage depends on the size of your pet but here are some estimates - the pink sweater from the instruction pictures used **372 m 407 yds ** of alize burcum batik 2164 - cover picture sweater miniature pinscher size used 189 m ** 207 yds ** of alize burcum batik 4340 **hook ** 5mm **scissors** **yarn & sewing needles** **a flat button** 2-3 cm or 1-1 5 in wide **sizing** the sweater is made-to-measure and can fit any dog or cat **a ** base of the ears → base of the tail **b ** shoulders → base of the tail **c ** around the neck **d ** around the widest part of the chest **abbreviations & stitches used ** st / sts - stitch / stitches skip - skip chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet decrease - decrease flo - front loop only blo - back loop only 1 https //youtu be/h6vflo666x4
